images.caption: Figure 1:The agentic workflow of ChaosEater. It autonomously completes the systematic CE cycle using LLM agents and existing tools. Note that only the representative inputs and outputs of agents are illustrated here. The two K8s clusters within the workflow refer to the same one.
Figure 3:Qualitative evaluation results of CE cycles for each system. A score of 3 or higher is considered a positive rating.
